ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bards Role (was CHains)
ygData.msgSnippet: Couple of things on this:  I m the cleric in this group, we are a regular group so soloing/pickup group is not an issue.  The 4 (still trying to get it back to
ygData.messageBody:
Couple of things on this: I'm the cleric in this group, we are a
regular group so soloing/pickup group is not an issue. The 4 (still
trying to get it back to 6) of us play every Thurs (or some other night
if THurs is bad) night. We email during the week to decide on our
target (s).

As for guilds/ multi group events. They are a LONG way off for us. We
play once a week for like 5 hours. We will be lucky to average half a
level a night pretty soon (right now we can still get a full lvl if we
get to our "camp" early, camp meaning where we set up, we don't camp
specific mobs for long, too boring). Doing some quick math, that means
we'll hit lvl 45 more than a year from now (I am factoring in a few
missed weeks for holidays, plus I know we will miss some during the
summer as 3/4 of us have a beach house for the entire summer)

We're discussing looking for a guild (on Veeshan). It wouldn;t really
change our play, except it would make it easier to find two more people,
plus we'd be able to help/get help with specific items/mobs. I don't
know if it will happen though.

BTW, since bards are probably pretty creative, I need to pick my last
name. I am a dwarven cleric named Legba. Our group is the Wandering
Hues, and we all take the last name of O'<color>. Example the warrior
is Willae O'Grae. I was thinking taking blue (for healing). What do
you all think? (O'Blue O'Blew O'Blough O'Bluwe etc...) Think blue is
the right color for cleric?
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
